data.title: John Crane Sqij Box Review
data.meta_description: A UK lifestyle and parenting blog written by a former teenage mother, covering day to day life, reviews, competitions, gift guides, features and more.
data.text:
When John Crane followed me on Twitter I really couldn't believe it, I checked, double checked and triple checked that it was the official John Crane Twitter account, after all why would they be following me!!? A new blogger, fresh on the scene, not a lot of experience, not established but John Crane was following me!! I tweeted a thanks for following message to John Crane, and that my friends is where it all began. Fast forward a few weeks and me and Spud was given the opportunity to review a Sqij Box set.

The Sqij Box is from John Crane's own brand collection - Tidlo Timeless Toys and is suitable for 2+ years, we was sent the large box that contained 16 pieces and a idea sheet.

John Crane have been around for over a quarter of a century. They are known for their beautiful, high quality, value for money, unique wooden toys and furniture. Representing brands such as Pintoy, Pin Furniture, Lilliputiens, GoGo Toys, Sevi, Trudi and B. John Crane caters for all ages including items that are suitable for 0+.

Sqij Blox are beech wood blocks sandwiched with foam layers meaning a variety of models can be made either by copying designs from the idea sheet included with the set or by simply using your imagination.

Spud used the idea sheet to copy some idea's as seen in the images above and below.

Sqij Blox helps with spatial awareness and hand to eye co-ordination. Spud like a majority of children loves using his imagination, he created this space monster in the image below from using the Sqij Blox.

John Crane was established in 1984 as a family business, It was the start of a long & fruitful relationship with wooden toys. John Crane are proud to be associated with some of the best loved brands, offering top quality, timeless toys.

If you are looking for unique presents for a child this Christmas, I recommend you take a look at John Crane's beautiful product range. John Crane sells a variety of beautifully crafted wooden objects targeted for children and their homes including: toys, imagination and educational play, outdoor toys including bicycles, furnishings and furniture, instruments, puzzles and much more.

To find out more about John Crane and their beautiful wooden products or to find out where you can purchase Sqij Blox from why not check out their website.

Until next time,

Jada x
